00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: input
00003 !
00008 
00009 module input
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public read_input
00014 
00015 contains
00016 
00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! READ_INPUT
00021 
00022   subroutine read_input
00023 
00024     use global,           only: nhistories,seed,source_type,mat,emin,emax,     &
00025    &                            allocate_problem,tal,n_tallies,n_materials,    &
00026    &                            res_iso,Dancoff,radius
00027     use materials,        only: setup_material,load_source,load_isotope
00028     use tally,            only: set_user_tally,set_spectrum_tally,             &
00029    &                            set_kinf_tally
00030     use xml_data_input_t
00031 
00032     ! local variables
00033     logical                        :: file_exists  ! see if file exists
00034     character(len=255)             :: filename     ! filename to open
00035     real(8)                        :: N            ! temp number dens
00036     real(8)                        :: A            ! temp atomic weight
00037     real(8)                        :: vol          ! volume of region
00038     character(len=255)             :: path         ! path to isotope file
00039     character(len=255)             :: name         ! name of isotope
00040     logical                        :: thermal      ! contains thermal lib
00041     integer                        :: i            ! iteration counter
00042     integer                        :: j            ! iteration counter
00043     integer                        :: nisotopes    ! number of isotopes in mat
00044     integer                        :: react_type   ! reaction type
00045     integer                        :: isotope=0    ! isotope for micro mult
00046     integer                        :: region=0     ! region to tally micros
00047     real(8), allocatable           :: Ebins(:)     ! tally energy bins
00048     logical                        :: dv           ! divide tally by volumes 
00049 
00050     ! check for input file
00051     filename = "input.xml"
00052     inquire(FILE=trim(filename), EXIST=file_exists)
00053     if (.not. file_exists) then
00054       write(*,*) 'Cannot read input file!'
00055       stop
00056     else
00057 
00058       ! tell user
00059       write(*,'(A/)') "Reading INPUT XML file..."
00060 
00061     end if
00062 
00063     ! read in input file
00064     call read_xml_file_input_t(trim(filename))
00065 
00066     ! read in settings
00067     nhistories = settings_%histories
00068     seed = settings_%seed
00069     source_type = settings_%source_type
00070 
00071     ! get size of materials
00072     n_materials = size(materials_%material)
00073 
00074     ! get size of tallies
00075     if (.not.associated(tallies_%tally)) then
00076       n_tallies = 2
00077     else
00078       n_tallies = size(tallies_%tally) + 2
00079     end if
00080 
00081     ! allocate problem
00082     call allocate_problem()
00083 
00084     ! begin loop around materials
00085     do i = 1,n_materials
00086 
00087       ! get number of isotopes and volume
00088       nisotopes = size(materials_%material(i)%nuclides)
00089       vol = materials_%material(i)%V
00090 
00091       ! set homogeneous volume
00092       if (trim(materials_%material(i)%type)=='homogeneous') vol = 1.0_8
00093 
00094       ! set up the material object
00095       call setup_material(mat(i),emin,emax,nisotopes,vol)
00096 
00097       ! begin loop over isotope materials
00098       do j = 1,mat(i)%nisotopes
00099 
00100         ! check volumes and number densities
00101         if (trim(materials_%material(i)%type)=='homogeneous') then
00102 
00103           ! set volume to 1 and don't adjust n dens
00104           N = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%N
00105 
00106         else if (trim(materials_%material(i)%type)=='fuel') then
00107 
00108           ! don't adjust n dens
00109           N = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%N
00110 
00111           ! check volume
00112           if (abs(vol - 0.0_8) < 1e-10_8) then
00113             write(*,*) 'Please enter a physical fuel volume!'
00114             stop
00115           end if
00116 
00117         else
00118 
00119           ! check volume
00120           if (abs(vol - 0.0_8) < 1e-10_8) then
00121             write(*,*) 'Please enter a physical moderator volume!'
00122             stop
00123           end if
00124 
00125           ! adjust number density by volume weighting
00126           N = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%N*                            &
00127          &   (materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%V/vol)
00128 
00129         end if
00130 
00131         ! extract other info
00132         A = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%A
00133         path = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%path
00134         thermal = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%thermal
00135         name = materials_%material(i)%nuclides(j)%name 
00136 
00137         ! load the isotope into memory
00138         call load_isotope(mat(i),N,A,path,thermal,name)
00139 
00140         ! check for resonant isotope in material 1
00141         if (trim(materials_%material(i)%type)=='fuel' .and.                    &
00142        &    trim(settings_%res_iso) == trim(name)) then
00143 
00144           ! get Dancoff factor and resonant isotope
00145           res_iso = j
00146           Dancoff = settings_%Dancoff
00147           radius = settings_%radius
00148 
00149         end if
00150 
00151       end do
00152 
00153     end do
00154 
00155     ! begin loop over tallies
00156     do i = 1,n_tallies-2
00157 
00158       ! check for divide by volume
00159       dv = .false.
00160       if (tallies_%tally(i)%dv) dv = .true.
00161 
00162       ! set reaction type
00163       select case(trim(tallies_%tally(i)%type))
00164         case('flux')
00165           react_type = 0
00166         case('total')
00167           react_type = 1
00168         case('absorption')
00169           react_type = 2
00170         case('scattering')
00171           react_type = 3
00172         case('nufission')
00173           react_type = 4
00174         case('fission')
00175           react_type = 5
00176         case('diffusion')
00177           react_type = 6
00178         case('transport')
00179           react_type = 7
00180         case('micro_capture')
00181           react_type = 8
00182           isotope = tallies_%tally(i)%isotope
00183           region = tallies_%tally(i)%region
00184         case DEFAULT
00185           react_type = 0
00186       end select
00187 
00188       ! preallocate Ebins
00189       if(.not. allocated(Ebins)) allocate(Ebins(size(tallies_%tally(i)%Ebins)))
00190 
00191       ! set Ebins
00192       Ebins = tallies_%tally(i)%Ebins
00193 
00194       ! set up user-defined tallies
00195       call set_user_tally(tal(i),Ebins,size(Ebins),react_type,isotope,region,  &
00196      &                    n_materials,dv)
00197 
00198       ! deallocate Ebins
00199       if(allocated(Ebins)) deallocate(Ebins)
00200 
00201     end do
00202 
00203     ! set up spectrum tally
00204     call set_spectrum_tally(tal(n_tallies-1),emax,emin,n_materials)
00205 
00206     ! set up k_inf tally
00207     call set_kinf_tally(tal(n_tallies),emax,emin,n_materials)
00208 
00209     ! load the source
00210     call load_source(mat(1),source_type,settings_%source_path)
00211 
00212   end subroutine read_input
00213 
00214 end module input
